org.whitesource.agent.client

Class WssServiceClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whitesource.agent.client.WssServiceClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WssServiceClient

    public class WssServiceClientImpl
extends Object
implements WssServiceClient
    Default Implementation of the interface using Apache's HttpClient.
    Author:
    tom.shapira, Edo.Shor
